mapper.insert: insert into tasks(taskcompanyid, taskname, taskdesc, tasktype, location, taskpayment, taskstatus, createtime, endtime, longitude, latitude, phone)values (#{taskcompanyid}, #{taskname}, #{taskdesc}, #{tasktype}, #{location}, #{taskpayment}, #{taskstatus}, #{createtime}, #{endtime}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{phone})
mapper.delete: delete from tasks where taskid in #{taskid}
